title: My First Threesome
description: Nothing like the first time you have a threesome. Whether to mix it up with your partner or just being lucky enough to find two partners in the right place at the same time. The steamy tales in this anthology will engage you, as you find yourself in your own menage a trois: you, this book and your imagination!Contributors to this anthology include: Tabitha Rayne, Nicky B., Madlyn March, Angel Propps, Kannan Feng, Angie Sargenti, Logan Zachary, Eric Del Carlo, Kaysee Renee Robichaud, Max Vos, Lise Horton, Beckah Rose and JG Faherty.
author: F. Leonora Solomon
